Title: The Deepening
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Gregory Thompson, Nora Smith (story)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: Mr. Fischoeder buys a mechanical movie shark as an attraction for his amusement park, but the kids accidentally let it loose on the town, forcing Bob and Teddy to save the day.
